ValidationRule.description: 28043 The Is Locate Required value cannot be blank if Status is Approved or Pending Approval
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Permit', ISBLANK(TEXT( Is_Locate_Required__c )), OR( TEXT(Status__c )='Pending Approval',TEXT(Status__c )='Approved') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Work Authorization Is Locate Required value cannot be blank if Status is Approved or Pending Approval
